data.description:
“Lamper VR is one of the most polished Gear VR games yet. Can't believe it's just $2.99” - VR Pill

Play as Lamper, a brave little lightning bug in a big, dangerous world. Explore lush woods and fiery caverns as you rescue and recruit your friends on an epic adventure! Use a fireballs and power ups to blast through your enemies! Experience fun gameplay and immersive worlds in this beautiful Gear VR runner game.

VIVID 3D VR EXPERIENCE
* Fly through colorful and immersive worlds!

EASY TO PLAY, FUN TO MASTER
* No controller necessary! Simply turn your head to steer.

ADDICTIVE RUNNER GAMEPLAY
* Dodge enemies and avoid obstacles on a mission to save your friends!

COLLECT AWESOME POWERUPS
* Defeat enemies and defend yourself in Fireball Mode! Double your coins and fly faster in the dazzling Rainbow mode!

PLAY AS 5 UNIQUE FIREFLY CHARACTERS
* Find, rescue and play as 5 exciting Firefly characters, each with their own flight style and character voices!

changelog.change_log:
Fly even faster in this major performance update!

* Optimizations, Performance and FPS Improvements
* Faster Loading Time
* Bug Fixes to address player issues
* Improvements for S7 users

* Brand New Lamper: Little Lamper got a huge upgrade! We hope you'll love the new look!
* Get More Characters: Find your friends faster! All 5 characters are fully playable & easier to unlock!
* New Gear, Better Game: Optimizations and Performance Improvements for the Brand New Gear VR!
* Bug Fixes: Fixed the bugs, kept the fireflies. ;)

* Brand New Home Menu: Explore a beautiful night sky filled with fireflies!
* Faster, Clearer, Better: Major Optimizations and Performance Improvements for the Note 4, S6, S6 Edge and Note 5.
* New Starting Area: Get a great start on every flight with more Sparks in this all new starting area.
* Bug Fixes: Addressed issues, left in the fireflies. ;)

New Rainbow Boost when you have a full charge of light. Earn double sparks during Rainbow Boost until time is up or you hit an enemy or obstacle. 
Updated Score screen with an improved layout.
Updated tutorial to teach Rainbow Boost mode.
